product_name: Columbia Three Rivers Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cozy, ultrasoft and lightweight, the women's Columbia Three Rivers Fleece Jacket keeps you warm on moderate winter days and breathes well so you don't get overly warm while you hike. Thick 360g polyester fleece resists light moisture and dries quickly. Full-zip front allows easy on/off and ventilation. Contoured shaping seams add flattering style. Zippered on-seam hand pockets secure small necessities. Columbia Three Rivers Fleece Jacket for women features an adjustable drawcord hem to seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Cozy, ultrasoft and lightweight, the women's Columbia Three Rivers Fleece Jacket keeps you warm on moderate winter days and breathes well so you don't get overly warm while you hike.
